ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Terrorsaur: Oh shut up, Terrorsaur said lowly at the other side of the section where the debating bots where. I bet everybot wants to have a try at leading

Terrorsaur:





"Oh shut up," Terrorsaur said lowly at the other side of the section 
where the debating bots where. "I bet everybot wants to have a try at 
leading the Predacons." He tilted his head back. "The only thing is, 
not everybot wants to follow anybody who raises his hand and shouts 
I'm leader! I'm sure not. They could tell us to put out heads near a 
land mine and ask us if it's operational. Maybe Megatron has a plan, 
but it hasn't worked yet. Maybe he's making up another plan right 
now." He pointed a thumb towards the back of the cave.
